description: Incip. (after preface, fol. 5a): ... قوله بسم الله الرحمن الرحىم ش ابتدأ رحمه الله بالبسملة اقتدا بالکتاب العزىز vol. 1 (through faṣ/ sann li-sahw). ff. 320. 305 x 210; 207 x 127 mm. 29 lin. Muḥarram 1054.
author: ḥaṭṭāb, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1497-1547
title: Mawāhib al-jalīl fī sharḥ Mukhtaṣar al-Shaykh Khalīl.
creator: ḥaṭṭāb, Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, 1497-1547
subject: Khalīl ibn Isḥāq al-Jundī, d. 1365?—Mukhtaṣar.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
